Reviews.Title: SFL1826
Reviews.Author: Leon "Leon"
Reviews.Content: I now have 3 of them installed around the house.I am able to view all 3 cameras simultaneously in real time.The box arrived with simple step by step instructions with pictures.The motion detection device looks like a regular one I have for the alarm system.What I liked in the first place is that its Wi-Fi wireless, I didn't want to worry about installing cables all over the house.This model has night vision, I can watch the kids room from my iPhone without leaving bed at night.Over all exactly what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I looked at hundreds of hidden cameras, eventually I decided to go with this one.I needed support connecting the camera wirelessly, I called support and the helped set it up.The camera is doing all I needed, its adjustable, the video is very sharp, and the audio quality is very clear.

Reviews.Title: Perfect indoor covert camera
Reviews.Author: Mkwp89
Reviews.Content: The best hidden camera on the market for the value.  Very reliable camera, works as described.  I'm going to add another one to the collection.

Reviews.Title: Just like I wanted
Reviews.Author: Ofer Izchaki
Reviews.Content: Shipping was fast, well packed, included manual with pictures and CD with programs.First I had to use the cable for initial configuration (my router doesn't have WPS for fast wireless configuration).WIFI is fast and I can see 30 frames per second.Definitely going to purchase additional unit for the basement.
